title: LEAGUE OF LEGENDS CLIENT NOT WORKING.
body: League of Legends client being terrible im joining lobbys late and keep disconnecting from client .WTF.

replies.body:
Yes something is wrong with the server

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/n9F6RgnQ-client-issues-8th-apr-2016
its the server from what i see the client is sooo laggy same issues here look at the other posts in the help & support section.
